title: Anbulla Mannavane Lyrics Mettukudi
stanzas:
Anbulla Mannavane Lyrics Mettukudi

Anbulla mannavane
aasai kathalaney(2)
idhayam puriyaatha
en mugavari theriyaathaa

kiliye kiliye po
thalaivanai thaedi po
mullil thoongugiren
kanavai allippo

thanimaiyil kanneerai
kangalil yaendhi po

Anbulla mannavane
aasai kathalaney(2)
idhayam puriyaatha
en mugavari theriyaathaa

vaa vaa kannaa endre
kenji kaetka po po po
vaasal paarthu vaadum
vazhvai sollu po po

ilamai urugum thunbam
indre solla po po.
nithamum idhayam yaengum
nilamai solla po po
kiliye kiliye po po

kathal ullathile
maatram sollu po
meendum mannippu
kaetukolla po

nadanthathai marandhida sol
uravinil kalanthida sol
madiyinil urangida sol
kangal thaeduthu 
thirumugam kaana

Anbulla mannavane
aasai kathalaney
idhayam puriyaatha
en mugavari theriyaathaa

vendhen endru koora
vanna kiliye po po po
vaasamalli poovai
sootta sollu po po

idhayam inaiyum neram
thanimai vendum po po
undhan kangal paarthaal
vetkam koodum po po
kiliye kiliye po po

niththam pala nooru

muththam kaetka po
saththam illaamal
jannal saaththi po

vizhigalil amudha mazhai
ini oru pirivu illai
uravugal mudivathillai
Gangai vanthadhu nenjinil
paaya. 

Anbulla mannavane
aasai kathalaney(2)
idhayam puriyaatha
en mugavari theriyaathaa
